REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0311 reute b f BC-SALOMON-RAISES-SIZE-O 03-12 0051

TEXT.TITLE: SALOMON RAISES SIZE OF CMO TO 350 MLN DLRS
TEXT.BODY: Salomon Brothers international inc said it has raised the size of its Collateralised Mortgage Obligation TRUST 23 to 350 mln dlrs from the 228 mln dlrs announced yesterday. All other terms of the issue remain the same, Salomon said. REUTER
